Title: Imposes penalties for non-compliance of division of housing and community renewal orders
Summary: Imposes penalties for non-compliance of DHCR orders by owners of multiple dwelling units; provides a fine of $5,000 for each instance of non-compliance.
LawCode: Add ยง14-a, Pub Hous L; add Title 26 Chap 1 ยง26-101, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to penalties for non-compliance of division of housing and community renewal orders
